39296751.review: Ys SEVEN while not the best installement in series, is definately worth your money. While it changes quite alot, in its core its still good old YS game. Great boss design, great music, likeable characters, and great atmosphere. A must have for all series fans.

My biggest regret is that I spent too much time after buying this playing good games and now I can't refund this piece of trash.

39224942.review: Another Ys game that doesn't fail to impress

39216790.review: Fantástico, compre sem medo, o segundo melhor ys da série, depois do Origin.

39160064.review:
Where to even begin.

I bought this game on sale for the steam winter sale for like 15$ and it was probably the best 15$ i've ever spent on a JRPG.
If you've ever watched a really good anime or played a really good game you know that feeling of nostalgia and and bittersweet feelings you get when you complete it.  Thats how this game made me feel.  The story while slow to start out gets more and more intense with excellent plot twists that I honestly did not see coming.  The fighting is exciting and fun and the leveling and item system is pretty good too.  Reminds me of tales of symphonia meets ff7.  10/10 would recommend

39124727.review:
씰 온라인이라던가 샤이닝로어 기억하세요? psp에서 이식되다보니 어쩔 수 없이 향수가 느껴지는 그래픽입니다.
그래도 개인적으로 이스 시리즈 중에선 최고 재미있게 즐긴 것 같아요.

1, 2의 몸통박치기나 6이나 오리진의 무기에 따른 스킬과는 또 다르게 각 무기마다 특징이랑 스킬이 있는게 적어도 이스 시리즈에선 신선하게 느껴서 좋았습니다.

소소한 퀘스트들도 추가해놓은게 출시 당시 플레이 타임을 고려한게 느껴졌고
전작들과는 다르게 AI와 3인 1조 파티 방식도도  꽤 재밌었어요.
(크루셰가 버프 걸어준다고 망치로 후려패서 절벽 밑으로 떨어진게 최고 재밌는 순간이었습니다)


1회차를 끝낸 후 생각하는 단점을 꼽아볼게요.

첫째로 2회차로 계승되는 시스템이 없어요. 덕분에 서브퀘스트를 지나쳐서 못하거나 모으지 못한 수집품이 있다면 새롭게 1회차를 플레이해야합니다. 당연히 했던 서브퀘들도 다시 다 해야하니까 조금 지루할 수 있겠네요.

둘째로 역시 그래픽이죠? 하지만 출시 기종과 출시 년도를 생각하면 그러려니 합니다.

셋째로 캐릭터의 성능차이가 있습니다.
항상 아돌, 크루셰, 아이샤 조합으로 가는게 편하고 강하더라구요.
엘크는 공속은 빠른데 물몸에 체력도 낮아요. 같은 검으로 아돌이 있는데 굳이 엘크를 쓸 이유가 없습니다.(갓슈도 비슷)
도기는 이쁘고 버프도 걸어주고 체력도 빵빵한 크루셰가 있는데 왜 도기쓰죠? 도기도 쓸 이유가 없습니다.
마이셰라는 소모 SP가 높고 느릿느릿해서 좀 답답해요. 상위호환인 아이샤가 있는데 쓸 이유가 없습니다.
성능만 따지자면 이렇지만 물론 캐릭터는 사랑과 애정이죠? 극복할 수 있습니다.

어쨌든 단점이라고 하면 저 세가지 정도겠지만 기술한 것들 외에는 전부 괜찮았어요.
만족스러운 게임이었습니다.

38904490.review: Just finished the game. Loved it. The hack and slash gameplay is awesome. Fast-paced and simple. Great story as well. A quality installment for the Ys series.

38862246.review:
Awesome combat, fast movement,  good boss fights, fun story.

This is the one game i got in the end of year sale that im REALLY happy i picked up.

10/10 recommended

38829489.review:
This is my first Ys game and I have to say that it was a really enjoyable experience. I was first introduced to Falcom games through their incredible Legend of Heroes games and I have always been curious of the Ys franchise for the past couple of years. I figured it was time to stop pondering and take the plunge into Ys Seven, their first 3d Ys title.

All in all, this game screams Falcom storytelling and action, which is a fantastic thing to behold. It took some time to get used to how the game works since I have been so used to the turn based combat of the Trails series, but once I got the hang of it, it became really fun to play.

Pros:

Excellent, fast paced combat.
Good story that draws you in over time.
Fun characters with interesting and funny dialogue.
Plenty of combat Skills that offer variaty of ways to fight.
Good soundtrack, but not even close to the quality of the Kiseki series of soundtracks.

Cons:

A lot of grinding to get everything.
Some environments were annoying to traverse, until you get the item that stops the issue.

In general, this game does many things right and I am eagerly waiting for Ys 8: Lacrimosa of Dana to make its debut onto PC soon, despite XSEED Games not being the ones helming the game. After playing Ys 7, I may consider going back to play the past Ys titles. I definitely recommend Ys 7 to be experienced by those who are: fans of the Falcom games, enjoy fast paced combat, or enjoy a good story, despite the grinding that is most definitely going to occur from the start.

Hope you all enjoy this game as much as I have!

38787320.review:
Ys SEVEN, ys game with party system, Adol + 6 companion.

A long game compared to other in series, so the story is more developed too ^^
Music is great as always ^^

38722492.review: Really fun game to binge play or to casually play here and there. May not have the same looks as Ys VIII Lacrimosa of Dana, but still pretty good game.

38721644.review:
falcom的兩大招牌：伊蘇系列，真的是蠻好玩的。
[b]但考慮到無中文字幕和日文語音，跟之前釋出的中文版比起來，真的是不太推薦。[/b]
整體：7/10  如果不是很飢渴的話其實可以等伊蘇八

[b]劇情：8/10[/b]
如果是第一次遊玩falcom系列遊戲的話，會被它一層層揭露的展開給驚喜到
但是對老玩家來說這些都是老套了，沒有這樣發展反而比較奇怪ＸＤ
老梗歸老梗，看得蠻開心的

[b]音樂：10/10[/b]
falcom的音樂不容置喙

[b]系統：6/10[/b]
簡單的裝備、飾品系統之外
屬性相剋的設計也很單純
而簡樸的支線任務和獎勵讓人興趣缺缺

[b]操作和戰鬥：9/10[/b]
boss fight 設計得很好
操作也很順，從頭滾到尾蠻開心的XD

[b]畫面：8/10[/b]
據說比以前pc版本優化了些，但是我感受不出來...小矮人HD還是小矮人啊
用大投影幕玩的話還會有點破圖
伊蘇8的話角色都長高了，比較讓我期待

[b]移植：3/10[/b]
對中文玩家來說，這真的不是最好的選擇
XSEED移植代表：無中文字幕和補丁(至少我找不到)
沒有日文語音，雖然語音少少的
算是變相鼓勵玩家找迷版來玩...又免費

38646511.review: 많은 플레이어블 케릭터, 미려한 그래픽과 짜임새 있는 스토리 ~ Good!

38642558.review: 優化的很不好 用電腦太難操作了

38607276.review: Ys in name only. It's more like a bad Final Fantasy clone. Reams and reams of awful dialog, lots of standing around, tepid combat. I don't think whoever developed this had ever played an Ys game before.

38451803.review: 最后的最后，MaYa哭着说出了不要离开我，感动到了

38389320.review: Amazing game! Up there with the good old Final Fantasy VII. Great story, gameplay and love the graphics style. Very old school :D

38337628.review:
Schönes Spiel. Bis zu diesem Zeitpunkt auf jeden Fall storytechnisch imo der stärkste Teil.

Das einzige was mich hier störte war, wie in Final Fantasy 7 bis 9 die Low Res Hintergründe und Texturen. Die Charaktere und Gegner an sich sind grafisch relativ scharf, aber bei manchen Hintergründen, Skyboxen und Texturen hat man nur Pixelmatsch. Das geht so weit das man teilweise nicht ausmachen kann, was das vor einem grad sein soll. Sehr schade das darauf keinen Wert gelegt wurde.

Aber alles in allem kann man dennoch nichts mit einem Kauf falsch machen. Das Ys Kampfsystem sticht weiterhin unter den ARPGs hervor. Macht bis zum Ende Laune. Kaufempfehlung.

Hoffen wir das Memories of Celceta eines Tages noch bei Steam erscheint. <3

38337051.review:
Die PSP Portierung ist Gut. Full HD, 60fps, läuft.
Zum Spiel selber: Ys Seven für die PSP ist das erste Ys Spiel mit seinem Party-basiertem echtzeit Kampfsystem. Dieses Kampfsystem gefällt mir ziemlich gut.
Wer aber Ys nicht kennt der sollte sich lieber den aktuellsten Teil anschauen. Aber Fans der Ys Reihe können den PSP Teil hier nachholen.
